# filter pages and documents for the noindex key


User-agent: *
# robotstxt.org - if _config production variable is false robots will be disallowed.

  
    Disallow: /feed.xml
  
    Disallow: /feed.xslt.xml
  
  


User-agent: Twitterbot
Disallow: *
Allow: /assets/images

User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Disallow: *
Allow: /assets/images
